Submit the form to deactivate your minin: Submit the form to deactivate your mining status.
You can activate it again afterwards.
You can deactivate your online status at: You can deactivate your online status at any time.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no: Submit the form to start mining. Your node has to be online unless you deactivate your status. Otherwise penalties might be charged after being offline more than 1 hour.
You can help with a donation :): You can help with a donation :)
Think up a short story about someone/som: Think up a short story about someone/something related to the two key words below according to the template
Your answers are not yet submitted: Your answers are not yet submitted
Please qualify the keywords relevance an: Please qualify the keywords relevance and submit the answers.
The flips with irrelevant keywords will: The flips with irrelevant keywords will be penalized
Your answers for the validation session: Your answers for the validation session have been submitted successfully!
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu: Now solve bunch of flips to check its quality. The flip is qualified if the majority, equals more than 2/3 participants, gives the same answer.
Your current status doesn't allow you to: Your current status doesn't allow you to mine.
Select meaningful story: left or right: Select meaningful story: left or right
You don't have any transactions yet: You don't have any transactions yet
Are both keywords relevant to the flip ?: Are both keywords relevant to the flip ?
Please confirm that you want to use your: Please confirm that you want to use your public address for the website login

Please, type http://{ip_address}:{port_number}
to connect to your node
Please check your local clock. The time: Please check your local clock. The time must be synchronized with internet time
Connection to node ko. Please check your: Connection to node ko. Please check your settings.
Shuffle images in order to make a nonsen: Shuffle images in order to make a nonsense sequence of images
Select 4 images to tell your story: Select 4 images to tell your story
Please no text on images to explain your: Please no text on images to explain your story
Make sure it is not possible to read the: Make sure it is not possible to read the shuffled images as a meaningful story
Waiting for the end of long session: Waiting for the end of long session
Please wait. The network is reaching con: Please wait. The network is reaching consensus about validated identities
Please wait for the validation report: Please wait for the validation report
Your status doesn't allow you to partici: Your status doesn't allow you to participate in the validation session
Please, stay on this page until launch.
To participate in the validation session: To participate in the validation session, you must provide your flips
The number of flips that can be reported:
The number of flips that can be reported
should be limited to 1/3
A good flip earns you rewards in iDNA: A good flip earns you rewards in iDNA
A bad flip penalizes you in iDNA: A bad flip penalizes you in iDNA
A good flip tells a story, assembled chr: A good flip tells a story, assembled chronologically, to represent an event or a process from beginning to end.
A good flip is EASY to solve for humans,: A good flip is EASY to solve for humans, but hard for robots.
A good flip uses clear, simple images, a: A good flip uses clear, simple images, and lets the story be obvious, with no ambiguity.
A good flip uses no text.
A good flip uses simple concepts that AN: A good flip uses simple concepts that ANYONE IN THE WORLD will easily understand, regardless of their native language or culture.
A good flip should be relevant to both o: A good flip should be relevant to both of the seed words.
A good flip makes use of the tools avail: A good flip makes use of the tools available including DRAWING and COLLAGE to help battle against AI and add creativity.
A good flip uses the shuffle to create a: A good flip uses the shuffle to create a 100% non logical alternative.
A bad flip has NO logical story, even if: A bad flip has NO logical story, even if it uses both keywords.
A bad flip contains numbers or letters o: A bad flip contains numbers or letters on images.
A bad flip is hard to understand.
A bad flip contains hateful, inappropria: A bad flip contains hateful, inappropriate or NSFW content.
A bad flip does NOT USE BOTH keywords in: A bad flip does NOT USE BOTH keywords in the story.
A bad flip uses objects in images in seq: A bad flip uses objects in images in sequence (1-2-3-4).
If even one of your submitted flips are: If even one of your submitted flips are reported during validation, you loose 100% of your rewards including invitation rewards for that validation
